channel.title: [RELEASED] SanguiSceptre
channel.description:
[color=red]I made this based off a Saradomin Staff, but tried to change it enough in which you can't tell... I just don't want to start from scratch and have it look like something on the tip of your nose, have to scale it out and screw it up that way. So, don't bash me too much for that. =/
[URL=http://img240.imageshack.us/my.php?image=sanguiscepteraz3.png][IMG]http://img240.imageshack.us/img240/6148/sanguiscepteraz3.png[/img][/URL]
I sort of went all out on the crap that I added onto it. Spikes on a handguard, a spike at the bottom, a levitation ring with concentrated energy orbs, a design at the tip, and a magic orb at the end. Whatever, hope you like it. If I get good reviews, I'll release it. =)
RELEASED!
Add these ints to your class8.class. [code] if(i == 9206) //SanguiSceptre { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 13055; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 2000; //1200 zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 13054;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 13054;//female wearing class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "SanguiSceptre";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Made by Pluh1".getBytes();//examin info }[/code] The inventory model isn't centered or rotated right, but idc. If someone rotates it right and zooms right, or whatev, just post the new ints and ill fix it tomorrow.
Download Links: (Drop and Wield both) [url=http://uppit.com/RIN39B]http://uppit.com/RIN39B[/url]
Read the Readme. Respect my work, don't leech it or claim it as your own. Thanks!

item.title: [RELEASED] SanguiSceptre
item.dc:creator: @pluh1 pluh1
item.description:
@pluh1 wrote:

i duh loot:

Unlike that other kid who only colored the zammy staff gold LOL

Rofl!

[quote=“i duh loot, post:8, topic:248105”]tbh, i didn’t really think of the sara staff till you mentioned it lol,
looks good.[/quote]
Awesome! That means I’m doing a good job =P Thanks, it’s great that you think it’s good. Really appreciating these comments peeps =)

Full Metalst:

Oh ok, so it’s just a staff? And the common one is a pharoh’s sceptre?

Yeah, basically. But I don’t like the pharaoh’s sceptre, it’s weird. I don’t like the colors. =/

Read full topic
